DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response describing the target biological entity registered or enrolled in the clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.:A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

Concepts.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research._A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Someone from whom bone marrow is removed for transplantation or other purpose.

Concepts.definition: Someone from whom bone marrow is removed for transplantation or other purpose.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that a donor of stem cells is healthy.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that a donor of stem cells is healthy.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An individual who is or becomes a participant in a research study and has no significant health-related issues.

Concepts.definition: An individual who is or becomes a participant in a research study and has no significant health-related issues.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A mother or a father; an immediate progenitor.: An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research.

Concepts.definition: A mother or a father; an immediate progenitor.
An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.

Concepts.definition: The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One who supplies a means of subsistence; one that makes something, such as a service, available, e.g. health care provider.

A member of the fundamental unit of society designed primarily to regulate sexual behavior and reproduce, nurture, protect, and socialize the youngs, traditionally organized around kinship ties, descend from the common progenitor or related by marriage or by a feeling of closeness; or of any of various social units differing from but regarded as equivalent to the traditional family.

Concepts.definition: Any of the individuals who are descended from a common progenitor, related by marriage or other legal tie, or by a feeling of closeness.

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Genetic Predisposition to Malignant Neoplasm Person
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The predisposition of an individual to develop a malignant neoplasm based on their heredity._A human being.

Concepts.definition: The predisposition of an individual to develop a malignant neoplasm based on their heredity.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
